subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{liushu|p}}: an infant with an imperfect cranium (i.e. [[fontanelle]]).

subSections.title: Pronunciation
subSections.text:
{{zh-pron
|m=ér
|m_note=Pronounced as '-r' in the suffix sense, merging with the previous syllable
|dg=эр1
|c=ji4
|h=pfs=yì
|mn=xm,qz,tp:lî/zz,kh:jî
|mn-t=ri5
|w=3hher,3nyi
|mc=1
|oc=1,2
|ma=y
|cat=n
}}
